title: Crazygoat.io web3 project
description: Web3 gaming is a process of decentralized gaming where the activities of a gaming ecosystem or a gaming platform, specifically that of the ownership of gaming assets and decision-making in all aspects of gaming, are delegated away from any central authority.

body.raw:
<Image src="/projects/crazygoat/og.png" alt="og" width={2267} height={1280} />

<Image
  src="/projects/crazygoat/web3.png"
  alt="3"
  width={2267}
  height={1280}
  caption="What is Web 3.0 Tournament? "
/>

<Image
  src="/projects/crazygoat/tournament.png"
  alt="2"
  width={3062}
  height={2042}
  caption="Tournament's transform responsively to fit the screen."
/>
